title: What You Think About Jesus,
lyrics:
What you think about Jesus,
He's all right
What you think about Jesus
He's dynamite,
Don't try to tell me my God is dead,
He woke me up this morning,
Don't try to tell me my God is dead,
He spoke to me today,
He opened up my blinded eyes.
Set my spirit free,
All I want to know about is
That man from Galilee
